NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 CASSAVA: Friends, we have successfully completed the excavation of the core of Giant's Deep. With this, the Deep Storm Station takes its first step towards realization! 2 1 AVENS: I expected zero-g at the center of a planet to feel quite different from zero-g in space, but it does not feel dissimilar to working aboard the cannon! Wouldn't you agree, Mallow? 3 2 CASSAVA: Avens, Mallow: kindly focus on the task of reinforcing the station's walls. We are surrounded by oceans of pressure - we must fortify the station's integrity with great care! 4 1 CASSAVA: Daz, Clary is almost done installing the new warp receiver within the Deep Storm Station. Once it is ready, it should connect us with the warp transmitter on the Construction Yard! 5 4 CLARY: Of note: we require a Nomai on the surface to warp to our warp receiver, in order to charge a return warp that will allow us to warp out! 6 5 DAZ: Have no fear, Clary; I am already waiting on the warp transmitter, eager to reunite with Cassava! 7 6 CLARY: My deepest gratitude, Daz. I shall be glad to take my leave before I become trapped in the station with two pairs of gelatinous Nomai! CB_EX5 5 CONV R3 5
